title: Marketplace Web App
imageAlt: Screenshot of the UCSD Student Marketplace application showing listings
description: A campus-only marketplace for verified UCSD students and staff to list, browse, and trade second-hand items and services. Built with focus on accessibility and performance.

title: Data-Leak Detection Algorithm
description: Supervised machine learning model in Python that flags code patterns linked to potential data leaks. Built dataset, feature pipeline, and evaluation workflow from scratch.

title: Automated Trading Bot
description: Streaming market data into a feature-engineered pipeline with model-driven signals, paper trades, and basic risk limits. Safe defaults and circuit-breakers included.

title: RunTracker CLI
description: Command-line tool to log running sessions and surface weekly trends. Helps track distance, pace, and consistency over time.

title: Tab Tidy Browser Extension
description: Browser userscript that groups tabs by domain and saves memory. Helps manage tab overload with automatic organization.

title: Boxer's Timer
description: Training timer with customizable rounds, rest periods, and audio cues. Tuned specifically for boxing roadwork and interval training.
